DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to assess the safety of hypofractionated stereotactic boost radiation (prostate) after normofractionated radiotherapy (prostate + seminal vesicles).
DOC.brief_title: Hypofractionated Stereotactic Boost in Prostate Cancer
